_sText:
|------------------------------|
|gg_edgecl by A.Werner aka Murf|
|------------------------------|

I dedicated a day to learn cell shading and tried it out on this map.
It's pretty cool but time consuming. I wish I could have done a larger map, but shading requires quite a big number of brushes.
You will notice the floating crates. I had to choose between floating crates or a bugged shade, because I don't really know how to make shades blend. If you have any ideas I'll be glad to launch a fix soon enough.

The textures of this map are the key colors of the game "Mirror's Edge", red and white, which is probably why the map is called "edgecl" ("cl" for cell).

The NAV file is included.

Thank you Karatek√§fer for skybox and Lost for cell shading tut.

Hope you enjoy the map just as much as I enjoyed making it!

Don't forget to assess!

A.Werner

***UPDATES***
28/09/09 - GOOD NAV FILE (Thanks inso1984!)
